test-case.name: One file
test-case.pre: echo "one two three four five" > file1 echo "six seven eight nine ten" >> file1

test-case.name: Multiple files
test-case.pre: echo "one two three four" > file1 echo "five six seven" >> file1 echo "eight nine" > file2 echo "ten" >> file2

test-case.name: No files, filter mode
test-case.stdin: one two three four five six seven eight nine ten

test-case.name: Options terminator handling
test-case.pre: echo "one two three four five" > file1 echo "six seven eight nine ten" >> file1

test-case.name: Words and hyphens
test-case.stdin: wordone word-two word- three wordfour- -wordfive word- .

test-case.name: Option -d
test-case.pre: echo "one two three four five" > file1 echo "six seven eight nine ten" >> file1
